'''Vincent Ferré''' (born [[23 October]] [[1974]]) is a French [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] scholar, lecturer and translator. He has written numerous books on the subject of Tolkien and medievalism, contributed articles to the ''[[Hither Shore (journal)|Hither Shore]]'' and the [[Tolkien Estate]], and runs his own dedicated Tolkien website [http://www.pourtolkien.fr/ Pour Tolkien]. Professionally, he is a Professor of General and Comparative Literature at the Sorbonne Nouvelle University. He is credited on the [https://www.tolkienestate.com/en/paths/credits.html Tolkien Estate website] as having written several articles and supervised translations.

==Books==
* [[2001]]: ''[[Tolkien: sur les rivages de la Terre du Milieu]]''
* [[2004]]: ''[[Tolkien, trente ans après]]'' (editor)
* [[2011]]: ''[[Tolkien aujourd'hui]]'' (co-editor)
* [[2012]]: ''[[Dictionnaire Tolkien]]'' (editor)
* [[2013]]: ''[[Tolkien - Du Hobbit au Seigneur des anneaux, la fabrique d'un monde]]'' (co-editor)
* [[2014]]: ''[[Lire J.R.R. Tolkien]]''
* [[2019]]: ''Voyage en Terre du Milieu'' (editor)
* [[2019]]: ''[[Dictionnaire Tolkien]]'', 2nd edition (editor)
* [[2024]]: ''[[Les Mondes de Christopher Tolkien: Hommage pour son centenaire]]''

==Articles (Selection) ==
* [[2003]]: ''[[Tolkien in Translation]]''
** "Traduire Tolkien en français: On the Translation of J.R.R. Tolkien's Works into French and their Reception in France" (with Daniel Lauzon and David Riggs)
* [[2004]]: ''[[Translating Tolkien: Text and Film]]''
** "Tolkien, Our Judge of Peter Jackson"
* [[2008]]: ''[[Tolkien's Shorter Works]]''
** "The Rout of the King: Tolkien's Readings on Arthurian Kingship – Farmer Giles of Ham and The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth" 
* [[2008]]: ''[[Hither Shore 4]]''
** "The Rout of the King: Tolkien's Readings on Arthurian Kingship"
* [[2008]]: ''[[The Ring Goes Ever On: Proceedings of the Tolkien 2005 Conference]]''
** "Tolkien, the author and the critic: Beowulf, Sir Gawain and the Green Knight, The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth and The Lord of the Rings" 
* [[2015]]: ''tolkienestate.com''
** "[https://www.tolkienestate.com/writing/vincent-ferre-leaf-by-niggle-the-hidden-nucleus/ Leaf by Niggle: The Hidden Nucleus]"
* [[2015]]: ''tolkienestate.com''
** "[https://www.tolkienestate.com/writing/vincent-ferre-is-the-lord-of-the-rings-an-adventure-story/ Is The Lord of the Rings an Adventure Story?]"
* [[2015]]: ''tolkienestate.com''
** "[https://www.tolkienestate.com/writing/vincent-ferre-daniel-lauzon-and-david-riggs-translating-tolkien/ Translating Tolkien]"
* [[2022]]: ''[[The Great Tales Never End]]''
** "The Son behind the Father: Christopher Tolkien as a Writer"
